p: Concentrations of cTnI at presentation were significantly higher in dogs that developed pathological arrhythmias compared to those that did not ( P <â€‰0.05). One dog with a pathological arrhythmia had normal cTnI concentrations at all time points. SS score was not significantly associated with arrhythmia grade, initial cTnI concentrations or peak cTnI on day one.
